info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 25 at 8:26PM CDT until May 25 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Norman OK
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Oklahoma, including the following counties, in central Oklahoma, Canadian and Grady. In southwest Oklahoma, Caddo.
* WHEN...Until 1130 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 825 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, El Reno, Anadarko, Yukon, Mustang, Piedmont, Union City, Minco, Okarche, Binger, Verden, Calumet, Gracemont, Lookeba, Norge, Cogar, Concho, Lake Chickasha, Cedar Lake and Richland. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT THIS EVENING

area.areaDesc: Caddo, OK; Canadian, OK; Grady, OK
